items.question: How does Lotti service work?
items.answer: Download the app and place an order in 2 minutes. Courier will arrive within 30 minutes and pick up the laundry. We will professionally wash your clothes. In 3 hours courier will return clean and ironed laundry. Track order status in real-time.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major bank cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), Apple Pay, Google Pay and Bizum. Cash payment to courier is also possible.

items.question: How fast do you pick up clothes?
items.answer: We strive to pick up your clothes within 30 minutes after placing an order. In 94% of cases courier arrives within 20-25 minutes. You can track courier location in real-time through the app.

items.question: Can I cancel an order?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel an order for free before the courier picks up your clothes. After pickup, standard service cost applies. Cancellation is done in 1 click in the app.

items.question: Do you work on weekends and holidays?
items.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week from 9:00 to 21:00, including all holidays. No extra charges for weekends and holidays.

items.question: What washing products do you use?
items.answer: We use only professional hypoallergenic premium products. They are safe for sensitive skin and suitable for children's clothing. Eco-products without chemical additives are available upon request.

story.title: Our story
story.subtitle: How we made laundry simple and easy
story.paragraph1: We're a small team of friends who believe routine can be simplified.
story.paragraph2: We asked ourselves: why does laundry still take so much time? Studies, work, family - no one wants to spend hours at the laundromat.
story.paragraph3: That's how LOTTI was born - a simple, fast, and affordable service. For just €12.99, we pick up your clothes, wash them carefully, and return them when it's convenient for you.
story.paragraph4: No hidden fees or stress - just clean and fresh clothes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Lotti we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with GDPR.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: At Lotti we collect the following personal information when you use our services:
items: Full name and contact details (email address, phone number)

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the collected information to:
items: Process and manage your laundry orders
Communicate with you about order status
Improve our services and user experience
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

section3.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
section3.intro: We process your personal data under the following legal bases:
section3.contract: Contract execution: To provide the services you requested
section3.consent: Consent: For marketing communications and non-essential cookies
section3.legitimate: Legitimate interest: To improve our services and prevent fraud
section3.legal: Legal obligation: To comply with legal and tax requirements

section4.title: 4. Sharing Information with Third Parties
section4.intro: We may share your information with:
section4.providers: Service providers: Payment processors, courier services, hosting
section4.partners: Logistics partners: To coordinate pickup and delivery
section4.noSale: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:
items: Restricted access only to authorized personnel

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
section6.access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
section6.rectification: Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
section6.erasure: Erasure: Request deletion of your data
section6.restriction: Restriction: Restrict processing of your data
section6.portability: Portability: Receive your data in structured format
section6.objection: Objection: Object to processing of your data
section6.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us: privacy@lotti.com

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.intro: We retain your personal information only for the necessary time:
section7.account: Account data: While your account is active
section7.marketing: Marketing data: Until you withdraw your consent
section7.cookies: Cookie data: According to our Cookie Policy

section8.title: 8. International Transfers
section8.intro: Your data may be transferred outside the EEA with appropriate safeguards:
items: Standard contractual clauses approved by the EU

section9.title: 9. Minors
section9.content: We do not intentionally collect information from persons under 18 years old.

section10.title: 10. Cookies
section10.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. See our

section11.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
section11.content: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email 30 days before they take effect.

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.intro: For questions about this policy, contact us:
section12.complaint: You can file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD): www.aepd.es
